title: Add missing tests for DeployedAddresses in @truffle/resolver
body:
Tests should be added to test the various paths of truffle.resolve.

  - [ ] [sourceFile matches blacklist](https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle/blob/77fce25d24d46b982188d3159bc2bdfecc4e8234/packages/resolver/lib/sources/truffle/index.ts#L34)
  - [ ] [abstraction matches blacklist](https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle/blob/77fce25d24d46b982188d3159bc2bdfecc4e8234/packages/resolver/lib/sources/truffle/index.ts#L40)
  - [ ] [address is deployed](https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle/blob/77fce25d24d46b982188d3159bc2bdfecc4e8234/packages/resolver/lib/sources/truffle/index.ts#L54)
  - [ ] [address is not deployed](https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle/blob/77fce25d24d46b982188d3159bc2bdfecc4e8234/packages/resolver/lib/sources/truffle/index.ts#L55)
  - [ ] [deployed address resolves to blacklisted name](https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle/blob/77fce25d24d46b982188d3159bc2bdfecc4e8234/packages/resolver/lib/sources/truffle/index.ts#L61)
  - [ ] [Deployed Addresses library](https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle/blob/77fce25d24d46b982188d3159bc2bdfecc4e8234/packages/resolver/lib/sources/truffle/index.ts#L70)

See [this commit](https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle/blob/77fce25d24d46b982188d3159bc2bdfecc4e8234/packages/resolver/test/truffle.js#L39-L42) for where to put the test
